channel.title: Reconnect Error when in-game
channel.description:
#### What happened? Every time I get the reconnect error, it goes to the black screen and attempts to reconnect. My game always crashes and I cannot rejoin the game. It won't let me click the 'cancel' button either.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I should be able to reconnect and I never can. I worry I am going to be reported for leaving the game when I'm still alive, but when it isn't my fault. Also, the cancel button should let you go back to the main menu.

item.title: Reconnect Error when in-game
item.dc:creator: Fury-Rook
item.description:
Thanks for that, I’ll endeavor to do this in future,

Read full topic

item.description:
Since your game crashes you should post your specs and upload your output_log.txt from the game files after a crash.

Read full topic

item.title: Reconnect Error when in-game
item.dc:creator: Fury-Rook
item.description:
What happened?

Every time I get the reconnect error, it goes to the black screen and attempts to reconnect. My game always crashes and I cannot rejoin the game. It won’t let me click the ‘cancel’ button either.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I should be able to reconnect and I never can. I worry I am going to be reported for leaving the game when I’m still alive, but when it isn’t my fault. Also, the cancel button should let you go back to the main menu.

Read full topic
